articles.title: Google Pixel 4a pops up in compatibility list for ‘StopCovid’ contact-tracing app - 9to5Google
articles.description: The country of France just launched its "StopCovid" contact tracing app and, in a compatibility list for that app, Google's Pixel 4a made a quick cameo.
